typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		num_order as string,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		modo_envio as string,
		cliente_id as string,
		imp_subtotal as double,
		region_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
